name: Cherry JM-0300 Wired Optical Mouse
Features: [Reliable corded mouse with three buttons and optical sensor, Striking blue light on sides and scroll wheel, Rubber side surfaces and rubber scroll wheel offer improved grip, Symmetrical design - suitable for left and right-handed users, High-resolution optical sensor with 1000 dpi resolution for precise and flowing cursor control, 1.8 m cable with USB connection for use on the laptop and PC]
